name: My Little shop
description:
Description

My Little shop is co-op game that is easy to start playing but hard to master. Even thou game is made for co-op play it is possible to complete it without friends (for those times when there are no friends

Features
  • Customizable characters
  • Challenging  levels
  • Up to 4 players on one device (8 over internet) (Currently only 2 local players are enabled)
  • Many shop variations
Coming soon
  • World wide multiplayer
  • Self hosted servers
  • 7 new levels every week
  • Increase local player count to 4
  • Controller support
Controls
  • Player 1
    • Move: WASD
    • Action: E
    • Recipes: Hold E
  • Player 2
    • Move: IJKL
    • Action: O
    • Recipes: Hold O
